snippet.title: Female genital mutilation "more common than thought" in Australia
snippet.description:
* Female genital mutilation "more common than thought" in Australia . "Circumcision is obligatory (for every male and female) (by cutting off the piece of skin on the glans of the penis of the male, but […] circumcision of the female is by cutting out the bazr clitoris [this is called khufaadh female circumcision])." -- Umdat al […] and by practice female circumcision" -- Australian Imam Afroz Ali "Female genital mutilation ‘more common than thought
15 weeks ago
